hero_title: Say goodbye to cash with intelligence
hero_description: Join the innovation of Public Transport with freedom, don't wait any longer!
product_title: Choose your ally along the way
name: Name
take_control: Take control of your recharges today
enjoy: Enjoy the perfect union between convenience and immediacy
step_1: Click on the Sign in button and enter the application
step_2: Choose the recharge method you prefer and indicate the service provider
step_3: Follow the on-screen instructions to finish recharging.
step_4: That's all! You now have your balance ready to use.
inspire_with_the_most_popular_routes: Get inspired by the most popular routes.
download_map_description: The map allows you to visualize routes and average travel duration between different locations. Simply click on any location to see its connections and estimated travel time.
your_integral_solution_for_recharges: Your integral solution for recharges, fast, easy and accessible from any device
why_buy_on_the_google_store: Why buy on the Google Store.
auth_basic_info_desc: Complete your date of birth and gender.
auth_future_date_error: Date of birth cannot be in the future
auth_min_age_error: You must be at least 13 years old
auth_error_try_again: An error occurred. Please try again.
profile_personal_info_desc: Info about you and your preferences across Google services

profile_addresses_desc: Manage addresses associated with your Google Account. Learn more about addresses saved to your account

auth_contact_method: What is the best way to contact you?

auth_passport_info: Please provide the following information as it appears on your passport or ID card.
